directions: Mix together sugar, vegetable oil, pecans, flour, and bananas in a 13 x 9 inch pan.  Stir in the eggs, pineapple (with juice), vanilla, salt and baking soda.  Mix well.  Do not mash the bananas.
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 60 minutes or until cake tests done.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
title: Jamaica Cake
